recipes.name: Toronto
recipes.description: Stir in mixing glass with ice & strain. Garnish with orange slice.

recipes.name: French 75
recipes.description: Pour all the ingredients, except Champagne, into a shaker. Shake well and strain into a Champagne flute. Top up with Champagne. Stir gently.

recipes.name: Cuba Libre
recipes.description: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

recipes.name: Moscow mule
recipes.description: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a highball glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently. Garnish with a lime slice.

recipes.name: Mimosa
recipes.description: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass. Garnish with orange twist (optional).

recipes.name: Bellini
recipes.description: Pour peach purée into chilled glass, add sparkling wine. Stir gently.

recipes.name: Black russian
recipes.description: Pour the ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

recipes.name: Caipirinha
recipes.description: Place small lime wedges from one lime and sugar into old fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with ice and add the Cachaça. Use vodka instead of cachaça for a caipiroska; rum instead of cachaça for a caipirissima;

recipes.name: Mojito
recipes.description: Muddle mint springs with sugar and lime juice. Add splash of soda water and fill glass with cracked ice. Pour rum and top with soda water. Garnish with sprig of mint leaves and lemon slice. Serve with straw.

recipes.name: Dark ’n’ Stormy
recipes.description: Fill glass with ice, add rum and top with ginger beer. Garnish with lime wedge.

recipes.name: Bramble
recipes.description: Fill glass with crushed ice. Build gin, lemon juice and simple syrup over. Stir, and then pour blackberry liqueur over in a circular fashion to create marbling effect. Garnish with two blackberries and lemon slice.

optionalIngredients.description: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

recipes.name: Kamikaze
recipes.description: Shake all ingredients together with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish with lime slice.

recipes.name: Lemon drop martini
recipes.description: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar, garnish with a slice of lemon.

recipes.name: Vesper
recipes.description: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the garnish.

optionalIngredients.name: lemon
optionalIngredients.description: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a orange zest, optionally a lemon zest.

recipes.name: Alexander
recipes.description: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle ground nutmeg on top and serve.

recipes.name: Americano
recipes.description: Pour the Campari and vermouth over ice into a highball glass, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice and a lemon twist.

recipes.name: Angel face
recipes.description: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Aviation
recipes.description: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

recipes.name: Bacardi cocktail
recipes.description: Shake together with ice. Strain into glass and serve.

recipes.name: Between the sheets
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Casino
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist and a marachino cherry.

recipes.name: Clover club
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with fresh raspberries.

recipes.name: Daiquiri
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Double Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Derby
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with fresh mint leaves in the drink.

recipes.name: Dry martini
recipes.description: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

recipes.name: Gin fizz
recipes.description: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into tumbler. Top with soda water. Garnish with lemon slice.

recipes.name: John collins
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon slice and maraschino cherry. Add a dash of Angostura bitters.

recipes.name: Manhattan
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cocktail cherry.

recipes.name: Mary pickford
recipes.description: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass

recipes.name: Monkey gland
recipes.description: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Negroni
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients directly into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with half orange slice.

recipes.name: Old fashioned
recipes.description: Place sugar cube in old-fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolve. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey. Garnish with orange slice and a cocktail cherry.

recipes.name: Paradise
recipes.description: Shake together over ice. Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.

recipes.name: Planter’s punch
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add dash Angostura bitters. Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple.

recipes.name: Porto flip
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

recipes.name: Ramos fizz
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients (except soda) in a mixing glass, dry shake (no ice) for two minutes, add ice and hard shake for another minute. Strain into a highball glass without ice, top with soda.

recipes.name: Rusty nail
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients directly into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with a lemon twist.

recipes.name: Sazerac
recipes.description: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Add the Lemon peel for garnish. Note: The original recipe changed after the American Civil War, rye whiskey substituted cognac as it became hard to obtain.

recipes.name: Screwdriver
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with an orange slice.

recipes.name: Sidecar
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Stinger
recipes.description: Pour in a mixing glass with ice, stir and strain into a cocktail glass. May also be served on rocks in a rocks glass.

recipes.name: Tuxedo
recipes.description: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cocktail cherry and a lemon zest twist.

recipes.name: Whiskey sour
recipes.description: Egg white is optional. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well (a little harder if using egg white). Strain in cocktail glass. Garnish with half orange slice and maraschino cherry.

recipes.name: White lady
recipes.description: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.

recipes.name: French connection
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

recipes.name: Mint julep
recipes.description: In steel cup gently muddle 4 mint sprigs with sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add the Bourbon and stir well until the cup frosts. Garnish with a mint sprig.

recipes.name: White russian
recipes.description: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Float fresh cream on the top and stir in slowly..

recipes.name: Bloody Mary
recipes.description: Stir gently all the ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Add tabasco, celery salt, pepper to taste. Pour into rocks glass. Garnish with celery and lemon wedge. If requested served with ice, pour into highball glass.

recipes.name: Champagne cocktail
recipes.description: Place the sugar cube with 2 dashes of bitters in a large Champagne glass, add the cognac. Optionally add a few drops of Grand Marnier. Pour gently chilled Champagne. Garnish with orange zest and cherry.

recipes.name: Kir
recipes.description: Pour Crème de Cassis into glass, top up with white wine.

recipes.name: Kir royal
recipes.description: Pour Crème de Cassis into glass, top up with Champagne.

recipes.name: Long island iced tea
recipes.description: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Top with cola. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon slice.

recipes.name: Mai-tai
recipes.description: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and pour into a double rocks glass or an highball glass. Garnish with pineapple spear, mint leaves, and lime peel.

optionalIngredients.name: salt
optionalIngredients.description: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a half salt rim (optional).

recipes.name: Tommy’s margarita
recipes.description: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: B52
recipes.description: Layer ingredients one at a time starting with coffee liqueur, followed by irish cream and top with triple sec. Flame the triple sec, serve while the flame is still on, accompanied with a straw on side plate.

recipes.name: Barracuda
recipes.description: Shake together with ice. Strain into glass and serve.

recipes.name: Corpse reviver #2
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well and strain in chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange zest.

recipes.name: Cosmopolitan
recipes.description: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

recipes.name: Dirty martini
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini glass. Garnish with green olive.

recipes.name: Espresso martini
recipes.description: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Golden dream
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice. Shake briskly for few seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Grasshopper
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice. Shake briskly for few seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with mint leaf (optional).

recipes.name: Hemingway special
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Horse’s neck
recipes.description: Pour Cognac and ginger ale directly into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. If preferred, add dashes of Angostura Bitter. Garnish with rind of one lemon spiral.

recipes.name: Irish coffee
recipes.description: Warm black coffee is poured into a pre-heated Irish coffee glass. Whiskey and at least one teaspoon of sugar is added and stirred until dissolved. Fresh thick chilled cream is carefully poured over the back of a spoon held just above the surface of the coffee. The layer of cream will float on the coffee without mixing. Plain sugar can be replaced with sugar syrup.

recipes.name: Tom collins
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon slice and maraschino cherry. Add a dash of Angostura bitters.

recipes.name: Pina Colada
recipes.description: Blend all the ingredients with ice in a electric blender, pour into a large glass and serve with straws. Garnish with a slice of pineapple with a cocktail cherry. 4 slices of fresh pineapple can be used instead of juice. Historically a few drops of fresh lime juice was added to taste.

recipes.name: Pisco Sour
recipes.description: Shake and strain into a chilled champagne flute. Dash some Angostura bitters on top.

recipes.name: Russian spring punch
recipes.description: Shake the ingredients and pour into highball glass. Top with Sparkling wine. Garnish with a lemon slice and a blackberry.

recipes.name: Sea breeze
recipes.description: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with an orange zest and cherry.

recipes.name: Sex on the beach
recipes.description: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with an orange zest and cherry.

recipes.name: Singapore sling
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into Hurricane glass. Garnish with pineapple and maraschino cherry.

recipes.name: Tequila sunrise
recipes.description: Pour tequila and orange juice directly into highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the grenadine syrup to create chromatic effect (sunrise), do not stir. Garnish with half orange slice or an orange zest.

recipes.name: Yellow bird
recipes.description: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Zombie
recipes.description: Add all ingredients into an electric blender with 170 grams of cracked ice. With pulse bottom blend for a few seconds. Serve in a tall tumbler glass. Garnish with mint leaves.

recipes.name: Brandy crusta
recipes.description: Mix together all ingredients with ice cubes in a mixing glass and strain into prepared slim cocktail glass. Rub a slice of orange (or lemon) around the rim of the glass and dip it in pulverized white sugar, so that the sugar will adhere to the edge of the glass. Carefully curling place the orange/lemon peel around the inside of the glass.

recipes.name: Hanky panky
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange zest.

recipes.name: Last word
recipes.description: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Martinez
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with Lemon zest.

recipes.name: Vieux carré
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange zest and maraschino cherry.

optionalIngredients.name: orange
optionalIngredients.description: Stir honey with lemon and orange juices until it dissolves, add gin and shake with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Optionally garnish with a lemon or orange zest.

recipes.name: Cachanchara
recipes.description: Mix honey with water and lime juice and spread the mixture on the bottom and sides of the glass. Add cracked ice, and then the rum. End by energetically stirring from bottom to top. Garnish with Lime wedge.

recipes.name: Fernandito
recipes.description: Pour the Fernet Branca into a double old fashioned glass with ice, fill the glass up with Cola. Gently stir.

recipes.name: Old cuban
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the wine, shake well with ice, strain into chilled elegant cocktail glass. Top up with the sparkling wine. Garnish with mint springs.

recipes.name: Paloma
recipes.description: Pour the tequila into a highball glass, squeeze the lime juice. Add ice and salt, fill up pink grapefruit soda. Stir gently. Garnish with a slice of lime.

recipes.name: Paper plane
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Penicillin
recipes.description: Muddle fresh ginger in a shaker and add the remaining ingredients, except for the Islay single malt whiskey. Fill the shaker with ice and shake. Double-strain into a chilled old fashioned glass with ice. Float the single malt whisky on top. Garnish with a candied ginger.

optionalIngredients.description: Egg white optional. Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, double-strain into chilled cocktail glass. If egg white is used shake vigorously. Garnish with mint springs.

recipes.name: Spicy fifty
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients (including 2 thin slices of pepper) into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, double-strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a red chili pepper.

optionalIngredients.description: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the ginger beer, shake well with ice, Pour unstrained into a Collins glass or in the original S. Bastard mug and top up with ginger beer. Garnish with mint sprig and optionally an orange slice as well.

recipes.name: Tipperary
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

recipes.name: Trinidad sour
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Ve.n.to
recipes.description: Egg white optional. Pour all ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled small tumbler glass filled with ice. Garnish with lemon zest and white grapes.

optionalIngredients.description: Egg white optional. Pour all ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, or “on the rocks” in a traditional clay or terracotta mug.

recipes.name: Naked and famous
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: New York sour
recipes.description: Bourbon can be used instead of rye. Pour all ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with ice. Float the wine on top. Garnish with lemon or orange zest with cherry.

recipes.name: Spritz
recipes.description: Build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with a slice of orange.

recipes.name: Gimlet
recipes.description: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail strainer, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

optionalIngredients.name: lemon
optionalIngredients.description: Mix gin and vermouth in a chilled pint glass, stir with ice. Strain into a champagne coupe.
Mix vodka and dry vermouth in a pint glass. The amount of vermouth used varies and can be as little as a drop. Stir with ice. Optionally add olive brine to make a dirty martini.

recipes.name: 20th century
recipes.description: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker, shake with ice, strain into a cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Artillery
recipes.description: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Whiskey fix
recipes.description: Shake in a cocktail shaker with a small piece of ice. Drain into the glass and top with crushed ice and garnish with a lemon wedge and a luxardo cherry.
